title: Gradient Colours
description: Gradient Colours collaborates with individuals, startups, and nonprofit organizations to provide professional marketing and design services at no cost. We also offer aspiring designers and marketers hands-on experience through real-world projects, helping them build portfolios and gain valuable industry knowledge.

title: C'est un Mood
description: C'est un Mood is a youth-led digital community that exists as a safe, expressive space for teenagers navigating the chaos of growing up. We explore real emotions, identity, fashion, music, and pop culture through aesthetic visuals and relatable storytelling. Our goal is to validate what teens feel, whether it's confusion, joy, burnout, or wild dreams. We've built a space where young people feel seen without having to filter themselves, creating honest connection in a world obsessed with perfection. It supports mental wellness, self-expression, and community building; all through the lens of Gen Z culture.
